name: ENGAGEMENT
description: No matter the size of the rock, this announcement is a big deal, so you’re going to want to make it extra special.

name: WEDDING
description: “Most of my photos are grounded in people. I look for the unguarded moment, the essential soul peeking out, experience etched on a person’s face.”.

name: CORPORATE-EVENT
description: If you want to hit a new audience or find new people, you’ve got to put some ad spend behind it.” In other words, if you want new clients, you’re probably looking to create ads, like the one below, in addition to organic posts..
